FILE  Rep PERIOD Mariannette MillerMeeks RIowa PERIOD

The Center Square  U.S PERIOD Rep PERIOD Mariannette MillerMeeks RIowa said Wednesday evening she received death threats after voting against Rep PERIOD Jim Jordan ROhio for speaker PERIOD

MillerMeeks voted for Jordan on Tuesday but voted for Rep PERIOD Kay Granger RTexas who chairs the House Appropriations Committee on Wednesday after seeing that Jordan did not have the votes to win PERIOD

 MillerMeeks said PERIOD 

Voting against Jordan is not popular she said PERIOD

 she said PERIOD 

MillerMeeks is calling for a consensus candidate to 

Jordan said on X the social media site formerly known as Twitter that Americans should not be accosted for their beliefs PERIOD

 Jordan said Wednesday PERIOD 

The House which has not had a speaker since Rep PERIOD Kevin McCarthy was ousted on Oct PERIOD  recessed after Jordan lost his second vote on Wednesday PERIOD
